info.description: Backend API for EDrota shift management system

POST /api/job-plans/{id}/terminate - Terminate a job plan by setting 'until' to today

200.description: List of shift requests pending admin approval

400.description: Invalid request_type or missing target_user_id for SWAP

post.summary: POST /api/marketplace/requests/{id}/accept - Accept an OPEN request

200.description: Request accepted, may be auto-approved or pending approval

400.description: Request is not OPEN or cannot accept your own request

post.summary: POST /api/marketplace/requests/{id}/admin-decision - Admin approves or rejects

400.description: Request is not PENDING_APPROVAL or has no candidate

200.description: Response processed, may be auto-approved, rejected, or pending approval

403.description: You are not the target of this proposal

200.description: List of shifts for a specific date
List of shifts within date range

put.summary: PUT /api/shifts/{uuid} - Update a shift (audit trail via DB triggers)
